targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "current" WHERE ("site_name" = 'mqtt_piko42') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total' OR "cpu" = 'cpu0' OR "cpu" = 'cpu1' OR "cpu" = 'cpu2' OR "cpu" = 'cpu3') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_temp_avg" WHERE ("site_name" = 'mon_smarthome') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value")/1000 FROM "cpu_temperature" WHERE ("host" = 'smarthome') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
